overview: Michael Kearns is founder and CEO of Amartus and has over 18 years experience in the software industry. Prior to Amartus, Michael led the Product Strategy team at Marconi Communications Ireland (formerly FORE System and Euristix) where he held overall responsibility for its multi-service broadband Network Management Solution strategy. Michael came to this role as a Principal Engineer where he had technical responsibility for architecture and design. Prior to this Michael worked for a number of top software companies in the US, UK and Ireland. Michael graduated from University College Dublin in 1992 with a BSc (Hons) in Computer Science
